data_event.label: Data Event
data_event.help: The event to emit when data is received from the connected devices. Default: data

message_event.label: Message Event
message_event.help: The event to listen to for device messages or commands. Default: message

groupmessage_event.label: Group Message Event
groupmessage_event.help: The event to listen to for group messages or commands. Default: groupmessage
